inputs.text: A corporation has 5 distinctive attributes: 1) a separate legal personality; 2) perpetual existence; 3) limited liability; 4) free transferability of an investor's interest; and 5) centralized management. The pre-eminence of the business corporation is in large measure due to the presence of these desirable characteristics.
